propositions.text: The world operates on a principle of strength, where the strong dominate and the weak are controlled.
There is no choice for the weak but to obey the strong, as they are the masters.
This dynamic is an accepted reality in the world described.

concepts.name: Strength
concepts.context: Represents power and dominance in the social hierarchy.

concepts.name: Weakness
concepts.context: Represents subordination and lack of control.

concepts.name: Master
concepts.context: Refers to those who hold power over others.

concepts.name: Obedience
concepts.context: The expected behavior of the weak towards the strong.

hierarchy.structure: The document is structured with a repetitive dialogue emphasizing a central theme of power imbalance, presented under a main title and subtitle with a specific section identifier (cat0290).
